cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text:

cards.rules_text2:
Indestructible
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent draws a card, you draw a card.

cards.notes: !append (Each Island you control counts towards your fealty to Islands.)

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Scry 3.
[-2]: Choose a card name, then mill a card. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards. Otherwise, you draw a card.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Play with the top card of your library revealed” and “You may play the top card of your library.”

cards.rules_text:

{U}, Discard a card with mana value X: Counter target spell with mana value X.
{U}, Sacrifice another permanent with mana value X: Return target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.rules_text2:

cards.special_text:
